patient.agreementConsentHeader: Agreement of the terms and conditions
patient.consentToCollectionText: To use this service, the information subject's separate consent to collect information is required. The type of information you collect is limited to anonymized requests and feedback data. If you do not agree to collect information, your use of the service will be restricted.
patient.consentResponsibilityText: This service is designed to enhance the convenience of patients' hospital use and is not applicable to medical devices and medical aids. We encourage you to avoid using this service for medical practice purposes, such as conveying your condition and symptoms and treating diseases, and we are not responsible for any negligence caused by this.
patient.patientSetUpTablet: Please choose the tablet and login with an account.
patient.patientSetUpTabletExplanation: This is used to assign the tablet to the in the hospital.
patient.patientSetUpModifyExplanation: The attributes can then be modified through the Preferences menu on the nurse's screen.
patient.requestTitle: If you want a quick solution
patient.confirmation: The question will be sent to the nurse
patient.patientFinishedRecordingRecordAgainBefor: If you want to edit, press
patient.patientFinishedRecordingRecordAgainAfter: for voice recording or edit directly with keyboard
patient.patientFinishedRecordingClickToEditText: Click the box below for editing with keyboard directly

nurse.nurseStaffUserListSubtitle: Double-click on the nursing staff information to find out more about the nursing staff. You can add users by pressing the plus button.
